content.text: table is designed to store audit records related to conversion equivalents for energy units and their associated CO2 emissions. This table captures changes or actions performed on another table, likely named

The complexity level of this table is considered medium due to the following factors:

It involves auditing logic, which adds complexity in terms of understanding the business rules and ensuring data integrity.
